Create bulk isotope plots (Œ¥18O vs Œ¥13C or over time).

Args:

df_data: DataFrame containing the data standards_list: List of standards or samples to plot show_residuals: Whether to show residuals over_time: Whether to plot over time bulk_isotope: ‚Äú13‚Äù or ‚Äú18‚Äù for specific isotope when over_time=True
